Articles.Content:
Here\'s a challenge; 

**Build a plane that matches a REAL plane as close as kerbally possible.**

**and make it FLY!!** 

Competitors have to guess witch plane the others have build.

so **only** show some pictures, if you did a good job we\'ll recognize witch plane you have build! 

You may use any mod available, even model new parts if you want to. 

To start off I tried to build one of my favorites: the SR-71 BlackBird, or whitebird in this case: 

![ckr4m.png](http://i48.tinypic.com/ckr4m.png)

![vr4my9.jpg](http://i45.tinypic.com/vr4my9.jpg)

Here is a few:

> ![screenshot26.png](http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab48/MaxMurder420/screenshot26.png)
> ![screenshot8.png](http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab48/MaxMurder420/screenshot8.png)
> 
> ![screenshot4.png](http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab48/MaxMurder420/screenshot4.png)

I also have a sweet F-22 but no screenies here... mabe ill post it when i get home.

I have something truely awesome. Videoing it soon as I can get the software running.

It\'s got so many parts that my KSP looks like a slideshow.

![KSP2012-05-2220-29-13-53.jpg](http://i1165.photobucket.com/albums/q587/GenJeFT/KSP2012-05-2220-29-13-53.jpg)

Not the best but close.

And not, say, MiG-1.44, Su-7, and A-10? Because it seems confusing for an F-22 to have canards, and a MiG-21 to have swept wings... ???

> Not the best but close.

B-57 Canberra?

> 
> -vid- KSP 'Aeronautical Re-engineering Challenge'

Great video!

I had to do some searching, but I believe that\'s an Avro Vulcan bomber!

Those inlets in the wing look really good

> 
> And not, say, MiG-1.44, Su-7, and A-10? Because it seems confusing for an F-22 to have canards, and a MiG-21 to have swept wings... ???
> 
> B-57 Canberra?

Yup. I made it from an image of the B-57A I found on wikipedia. It does not fly very well in KSP.

Take a guess at these!

> 
> ![n90mc.png](http://i.imgur.com/n90mc.png)
> 
> ![VwbsQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/VwbsQ.png)
> 
> 

The first one is easy, the second one might take you a bit longer.
